short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension compares hotel rates on Booking.com to identify and showcase the best available rates through liteAPI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension compares hotel rates on Booking.com to identify and showcase the best available rates through liteAPI. Additionally, the extension includes a search form that allows users to find hotels in their preferred destinations.
